name: @saekitominaga/customelements-tab
description: Implement tabs UI component by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tab.js -- brotlin compress dist/Tab.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tab.js -- terser dist/Tab.js -o dist/Tab.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/Tab.js.map',filename='Tab.js',includeSources,url='Tab.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tab.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/Tab.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tab.d.ts -- cpy dist/Tab.d.ts dist --rename=Tab.min.d.ts
